name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twos: The best place to write *things* down

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for Twos: The best place to write *things* down

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the official Chrome extension for Twos ✌️ (www.TwosApp.com).

Once you have an account, you can login and easily add websites and text to your Today using this Chrome extension.

Let us know if you need any help.

Have a happy Twosday ✌️
